featured.text: It can be inferred from the passage that Howard will probably gain his weight back again.
The students lost an average of 2.34 kilograms during the past two months, and the student who lost the most, the nine-year-old Howard Chang, shed more than six kilograms.
Why is Howard Chang specifically mentioned in the passage? 4.
“Howard calculated the calories of everything he ate during his participation in the program,” his mother said.

definition.zh_def: 霍華德，一個常見的男性名字，源自古英語，意指“守衛者”。
definition.en_def: Howard is a common male given name of Old English origin, meaning 'guardian'.
definition.example: Howard decided to take a different route to work today.
